panels.title: Top Temp Blocks Read per Call

targets.expr:
sort_desc(topk(5,sum(irate(pg_stat_statements_time_milliseconds{instance=~"$host"}[10m])) by (queryid, datname, user)) unless 
topk(20,sum(irate(pg_stat_statements_time_milliseconds{instance=~"$host"}[10m] offset 7d)) by (queryid, datname, user)))

panels.title: New Slow Queries for All Databases
